name: vuejs-laravel-table-pagination-crud
description: Laravel Crud module in vuejs with pagination, sorting, modal
author: Julien Kennel

scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/modalvuecomponent.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/modalvuecomponent.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/modalvuecomponent.min.js
